title: Vocabulary: Word Analysis and Etymology

vocab.definition: The study of the origin and history of words
The main part of a word that carries the basic meaning
A word part added to the beginning of a root word
A word part added to the end of a root word
The study of how words are formed from smaller meaningful parts

teachingNotes: Practice breaking down complex words into parts. Teach common Greek and Latin roots. Show how understanding word parts helps with meaning and spelling.

sample.question: What do we call the study of word origins and history?

truefalse.question: A prefix is added to the beginning of a root word.

multiplechoice.question: In the word 'unhappy,' what is the prefix?

fillintheblank.question: The main part of a word that carries the basic meaning is the ________ word.

shortanswer.question: How can knowing prefixes and suffixes help you understand new words?
